pkgmetadata.longdescription: Fluxbox is yet another windowmanager for X. Originally based upon the Blackbox 0.61.1 code, Fluxbox has been extended to include a new tabbed window handling mechanism, an improved configurable window title bar, better KDE and GNOME integration, an integrated keygrabber and countless additonal features.
